DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study assess psychosocial burden woman experience abnormal pap result screen intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Psychosocial Burden Women With Abnormal Pap Results After Screening Interventions
DOC.detailed_description: This study Thailand , clinic-based , cross-sectional , questionnaire study . Approximately 151 female participant enrol . Study staff interview subject collect basis demographic data self report medical history . And subject give questionnaire packet self-administration . After subject complete packet , study staff review questionnaires completeness prior study subject leave clinic .
DOC.criteria: female , 18 45 year age must recently experience abnormal pap result within past 3 month . condition opinion investigator might interfere evaluation study objective concurrent/active STD 's history know prior vaccination HPV vaccine history recent ( within 1 year date enrollment ) ongoing alcohol abuse drug abuse .
